movie.title: Bloody Spear at Mount Fuji
movie.description_intro: A samurai travels to Edo with his two servants. On their way, they meet many people and encounter great injustice.
movie.description_full: A samurai travels to Edo with his two servants. On their way, they meet many people and encounter great injustice.

movies.title: Gabriela
movies.summary: In 1925, Nacib (Marcello Mastroianni) is the owner of bar in a small Brazilian coastal town runs by the local colonels. He meets Gabriela (Sonia Braga) and hires her on as a cook. They soon enter a passionate relationship, fueled by his strong attraction to her sensual nature. However, he soon grows annoyed by the attention she receives. Under advisement of his best friend, Tonico (Cantafora), he proposes to her, partly in the hopes that the attention quells. After their marriage, he insists that she dress and behave more modestly so they can be seen as more respectable. Unfortunately, she cannot help but stray and he is forced to annul the marriage when he finds her in bed with Tonico. Later, as both Nacib and the town begin to undergo a transformation, Nacib and Gabriela resume their relationship. The political ways of the town modernize slightly and Gabriela returns as Nacib's mistress.

movies.title: Bianca
movies.summary: Michele is a mathematics professor who just started a new job in a school with some peculiar teaching methods. After a woman in his neighborhood is murdered, Michele meets beautiful colleague Bianca, and a relationship begins between the two. Where is this relationship heading, and will Michele be able to help the police catch the murderer?

movies.title: In the Cloud
movies.summary: The movie is about a tech company, which is developing software capable of uploading a person's consciousness and memories to a virtual space.
movies.description_full: The movie is about a tech company, which is developing software capable of uploading a person's consciousness and memories to a virtual space.
movies.synopsis: The movie is about a tech company, which is developing software capable of uploading a person's consciousness and memories to a virtual space.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.summary: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.
